K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:1b-1: bhikshu n'i pra ti moksha s'u tra /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:1b-3: dge slong ma'i so sor thar pa'i mdo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:1b-5: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:1b-6: sangs rgyas 'gro mgon gcig dang dam chos dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:1b-7: 'phags tshogs dkon mchog rnams la phyag 'tshal te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:1b-8: bdag gis sdug bsngal rnam par thar pa'i rgyu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2a-2: snyan pa'i ba dan 'jig rten gsum du grags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2a-3: dam pa'i chos sgra seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa; ;thams cad mkhyen pa dkon mchog mdzod brnyes pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2a-4: zhabs la tshangs dbang gtsug gi nor bus gtugs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2a-5: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho gting mtha' med brgal ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2a-6: 'gro ba'i gtso la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2a-7: thams cad mkhyen pa'i bslab gzhi dkon mchog snod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2a-8: 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi dbus su dbye bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2a-9: sangs rgyas 'dul ba gangs chen mtsho //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2a-10: gting mtha' med pa thams cad kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2a-11: gnas pa'i snying dang snying po ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2a-12: so sor thar pa 'di yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2a-13: 'di ni dam chos rgyal po yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-0: chos @2b kun gyi ni 'dren pa'i mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-1: 'di ni dge slong tshong tshogs kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-2: bslab zong tshong khang chen po yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-3: tshul khrims 'chal pas zin rnams kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-4: gdug pa rnams sel sman 'di yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-6: rkang gnyis gzhon nu'i lcags kyu yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-7: mtsho bas zab pa'i 'khor ba las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-8: sgrol ba'i rgal thabs 'di yin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-10: nges pa'i chu lon zam pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-11: 'di ni nyon mongs pham byed lam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-12: rgyal po yi ni 'dren pa mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-14: them skas gzhi dang 'dra bar gnas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-15: nga ni mya ngan 'das gyur na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-16: 'di ni khyed kyi ston pa'o zhes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-17: rang byung nyid kyis gus bcas par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-18: nan tan dge slong tshogs mdun bstod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-19: sangs rgyas zhes bya'i sgra 'di yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-20: 'jig rten dag na rab tu dkon //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-21: mi nyid rnyed pa shin tu dkon //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-22: rab tu byung ba shin tu dkon //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-23: de bzhin rab tu byung rnams kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:2b-24: tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dkon //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3a-2: grogs bzang shin tu rnyed par dka'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3a-4: mi dang rab tu byung ba dang; ;tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3a-5: grogs bzang rnyed dka' rnyed gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3a-6: mkhas pa bdag la legs 'dod cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3a-8: sdom brtson rnams kyis so sor thar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3a-9: mnyan pa'i phyir ni 'bad par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3a-10: dge slong dbang dul kun dbang po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3a-11: sangs rgyas mi 'gyur rab byung ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3a-12: nges par thar pa 'dod rnams kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3a-13: so sor thar pa rtag tu srungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3a-14: bskal pa bye ba rnams su yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3a-15: so sor thar pa thos pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3a-16: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnyed dka' zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3a-17: sgrub pa'ang shin tu rnyed par dka'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3a-18: sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3a-19: chos bstan pa yang bde ba yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3a-20: dge 'dun mthun pa bde ba ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3a-21: mthun pa rnams kyi dka' thub pa de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3a-22: 'phags pa rnams ni mthong ba bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3a-23: dam pa dag dang 'grogs pa bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-0: byis pa @3b rnams ni ma mthong na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-1: rtag tu bde ba nyid du 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-2: tshul khrims ldan pa mthong ba bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-3: mang du thos pa mthong ba bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-4: yang srid rnam par grol ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-5: dgra bcom pa dag mthong ba bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-6: 'jug ngogs bde ba'i chu klung bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-7: chos la goms pa'i skye bo bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-8: shes rab thob par gyur pa bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-10: nges par byas shing dbang po thul ba dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-11: dgon pa zhi ba rnams su rgas gyur dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-12: mang du thos pa nags kyi nang dag tu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-13: lang tsho yol ba rnams kyi gnas pa bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-15: so ga rnams kyi 'das pa dang lhag ma ji tsam pa de tsam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-19: 'chi ba mngon par 'ong zhing ston pa'i bstan pa yang 'jig par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-20: chos kyi ri rab kyang 'jig par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-21: chos kyi shing ljon pa'ang 'chag par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-24: chos kyi rgya mtsho 'ang bskam par 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-25: ma rig pa'i mun gnag ni mthu che bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-26: sgrub par byed pa ni yongs su nyams par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-27: sgrub pa po dag med na yun mi ring bar 'jig rten 'di na snang ba med par 'gyur bas de'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-28: 'phags ma dag bag yod pas rnal 'byor du bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:3b-30: gzhan yang gang dag de lta bu dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang bag yod pas 'thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni @4a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-2: bya ba nyung ba yin pas dge 'dun thog mar bya ba ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-3: 'phags ma dag ma lhags pa rnams la 'dun pa dang yongs su dag pa dris shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-4: dris nas kyang brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-5: sh'akya seng ge de la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-6: sor mo bcu yis thal sbyar nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-7: so sor thar pa gdon par byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-8: gdul ba'i don du nga las nyon //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-9: thos nas drang srong chen po yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-10: ji skad gsungs bzhin bsgrub bya zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-11: kha na ma tho phra rnams la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-12: brtun cing byed pa nyid du gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-13: rtag tu 'bad pas bda' ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-14: sems rta kha blan dka' ba la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-15: mthun pa'i gzer rnon brgyab pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-16: srab ni so sor thar 'di yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-17: che ba gang dag ngag tsam gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-18: ldog cing mtshams las mi 'da' ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-19: de dag mi rta bzang po ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-20: nyon mongs g-yul las nges rgyal 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-21: su la srab 'di med pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-23: de dag nyon mongs g-yul gyis dkrugs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-25: dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams gsan du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-26: deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa'am bco lnga pa lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-27: gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-28: dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-29: deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-30: so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-32: 'phags ma dag bdag cag gso sbyong bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4a-33: bdag gis so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4b-0: legs par nyon la rab tu yid la gyis shig dang bdag @4b gis khyed la bshad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4b-1: khyed cag su la ltung ba yod pa des mthol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4b-2: ltung ba med na cang ma smra zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4b-3: cang mi smra na bdag gis 'phags ma dag yongs su dag par rig par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4b-4: ji ltar so sor dris nas dge slong mas lan btab pa de bzhin du dge slong ma'i 'khor 'di lta bur yang lan gsum gyi bar du bsgrag par bya ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4b-5: yang dge slong ma gang dge slong ma'i 'khor 'di lta bur lan gsum gyi bar du bsgrags pa na ltung ba yod la dran bzhin du mi mthol na de shes bzhin du brdzun du smra ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4b-6: 'phags ma dag shes bzhin du brdzun du smra ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs so; ;de bas na dge slong ma ltung ba byung ba rnam par dag par 'dod pas ltung ba yod la dran bzhin du mthong ba mthol bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4b-7: mthol na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4b-8: ma mthol ma bshags na mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4b-9: 'phags ma dag bdag gis so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa'i gleng gzhi bton zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4b-10: de la bdag gis 'phags ma dag ci 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4b-11: ci 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4b-12: 'di la 'phags ma dag yongs su dag na 'di ltar cang mi smra bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4b-14: mi tshangs spyod dang rku ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4b-15: mi gsod brdzun du smra ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4b-16: sa ga'i bu dang spos tshong khye'u //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:4b-17: mdza' mo dang ni gre skyes pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5a-0: 'phags ma dag pham par 'gyur ba'i chos brgyad po 'di dag ni zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i @5a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5a-2: yang dge slong ma gang dge slong ma rnams dang lhan cig bslab pa mtshungs par gyur pas bslab pa ma phul /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5a-3: bslab pa nyams par ma byas par mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten na tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa dang lhan cig kyang rung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5a-4: dge slong ma de yang pham par gyur pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5a-6: yang dge slong ma gang gzhan dag gi grong na 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5a-7: dgon pa na 'dug pa ma byin par len pa rku ba'i grangs su gtogs pa blangs na ji tsam ma byin par blangs pas de rgyal po'am blon po chen pos bzung nas de la 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5a-8: kye bud med khyod ni rkun ma'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5a-15: dge slong ma de ltar ma byin par len na dge slong ma de yang pham par 'gyur ba yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5a-17: yang dge slong ma gang mi'am mir 'chags pa la bsam bzhin du rang gis lag dar te srog bcad dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5a-19: de las mtshon thogs pa gnyer tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5a-21: de la 'chi ba'i bsngags pa brjod kyang rung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5a-22: de la 'di skad ces kye mi khyod 'tsho ba sdig pa mi gtsang ba ngan pa 'dis ci zhig bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5a-23: kye mi khyod gson pa bas shi bla'o zhes zer zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5a-24: sems kyi 'dod pa dang sems kyi kun tu rtog pa dag gis rnam grangs du mas de 'chir bcug gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5b-0: de la 'chi ba'i bsngags pa brjod de @5b de yang brtsam pa des dus byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5b-1: dge slong ma de yang pham par gyur pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5b-3: yang dge slong ma gang mngon par mi shes shing yongs su mi shes la mi'i chos bla ma mtha' dang 'phags pa dang bye brag thob pa dang shes pa dang mthong ba dang reg par spyod pa med la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5b-5: 'di mthong ngo zhes khas 'ches pa las de ltung ba byung ba rnam par dag par 'dod pas dus gzhan zhig na dris kyang rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5b-6: ma dris kyang rung 'di skad ces 'phags ma dag bdag gis ni mi shes par shes so zhes smras /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5b-7: ma mthong bar mthong ngo zhes smras te gsog gsob brdzun du smras so zhes zer na mngon pa'i nga rgyal ma gtogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5b-8: dge slong ma de yang pham par gyur pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5b-10: yang dge slong ma gang chags par gyur pas skyes pa chags par gyur pa dang lhan cig mig man chad pus mo yan chad kyi bar du sprad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5b-11: kun tu sprad pa nyams su myong bar byed na dge slong ma de yang pham par gyur pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5b-13: yang dge slong ma gang chags par gyur pas skyes pa chags par gyur ba dang lhan cig gzhogs stegs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5b-19: skyes pa 'ong ba dang 'gro ba bdag gir byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:5b-20: gang du skyes pas bud med bgrod du rung ba de lta bu'i phyogs su lus bkan pa gzhi brgyad po'i gnas 'di lta bu dge slong mas byas na dge slong ma de yang pham par gyur pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:6a-1: gang dge slong ma zhig la pham par gyur pa byung bar shes bzhin du 'chab par byed cing gang gi tshe de nyams sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:6a-4: yul 'khor gzhan dang yul gzhan du bros par gyur pa de'i tshe 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:6a-5: 'phags ma dag bdag gis dge slong ma de la ji ltar pham par gyur pa byung bar snga nas shes so zhes zer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:6a-6: dge slong ma de yang pham par gyur pa yin gyi; gnas par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:6a-7: yang dge slong ma gang dge slong gi dge 'dun mthun pas dge slong gang la gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas te dge slong ma'i dge 'dun mthun pas phyag bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i sdom pa byin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:6a-10: dge slong gi dge 'dun la spu snyol bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:6a-12: mtshungs pa nye bar ston la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:6a-13: mtshams kyi nang du 'dug ste bzod pa gsol bar shes bzhin du de la 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:6a-16: dge slong gi dge 'dun la spu snyol bar ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:6a-18: mtshungs pa nye bar ma ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:6a-19: mtshams kyi nang du 'dug ste bzod par gsol bar ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:6a-20: bdag gis 'phags pa khyod la lhung bzed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:6a-29: 'phags pa la ci dang cis brel ba de dang des mi brel bar bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes zer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:6b-0: dge slong @6b ma de la dge slong ma rnams kyis 'di skad ces 'phags ma khyod dge slong gi dge 'dun mthun pas dge slong gang la gnas nas dbyung ba'i 'phrin las mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:6b-1: dge slong ma'i dge 'dun mthun pas phyag bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i sdom pa byin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:6b-4: dge slong gi dge 'dun la spu snyol bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:6b-6: mtshungs pa nye bar ston la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:6b-7: mtshams kyi nang du 'dug ste; bzod par gsol bar shes bzhin du de la 'di skad ces 'phags pa khyod skra 'greng bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:6b-9: dge slong gi dge 'dun la spu snyol bar ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:6b-11: mtshungs pa nye bar ma ston cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:11b-0: dge slong ma 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad @11b 'dogs par byed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:11b-1: dge slong ma 'di shes bzhin du smra'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:11b-2: mi shes par ni ma yin pa'i phyir te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:11b-3: dge slong ma 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:11b-7: dge slong ma 'di ni chos ma yin pa smra ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:11b-8: 'dul ba ma yin pa smra ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:11b-9: dge slong ma 'di ni chos ma yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:11b-10: 'dul ba ma yin pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:11b-11: dge slong ma 'di ni mi shes bzhin du smra'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:11b-12: shes par smra ba ma yin pa'i phyir te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:11b-13: dge slong ma 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la 'phags ma dag bzod par ma byed cig; 'phags ma dag khyed dge 'dun 'byed 'dod par ma byed par 'phags ma dag dge 'dun mthun pa dag nyid du 'dod par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:11b-14: 'phags ma dag dge 'dun mthun par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:11b-20: chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa lta bur gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:11b-21: ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:11b-22: 'phags ma dag dge 'dun 'byed pa'i rjes su phyogs shing mi mthun par smra ba 'di lta bu 'di thong zhig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:11b-23: dge slong ma de dag la dge slong ma rnams kyis de skad bsgo na gal te gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:11b-24: gal te mi gtong na gzhi de gtong bar bya ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:11b-25: yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12a-0: lan gnyis lan gsum du yang @12a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12a-2: yang dag par bstan pa na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12a-3: gal te mi gtong na chos 'di yang lan gsum gyi bar gyis ltung bar 'gyur la 'byung ba dang bcas pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12a-5: dge slong ma rab tu mang po dag grong ngam grong rdal zhig na nye bar rten cing gnas par gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12a-6: de dag kyang khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod par gyur cing; de dag gis khyim dag sun 'byin par mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12a-9: de dag sdig pa kun tu spyod par mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12a-12: dge slong ma de dag la dge slong ma rnams kyis 'di skad ces 'phags ma dag khyed khyim sun 'byin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12a-13: sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa dag yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12a-14: khyed kyis khyim dag sun phyung bar mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12a-15: khyed sdig pa kun tu spyod par yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12a-16: 'phags ma dag khyed 'di na gnas pas chog gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12a-17: gnas 'di nas deng zhig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12a-18: gal te de dag dge slong ma rnams la 'di skad ces 'phags ma dag 'di na dge slong ma kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12a-22: 'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12a-23: dge slong ma kha cig ni skrod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12a-24: kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes zer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12b-0: dge slong ma de dag la dge slong ma rnams kyis 'di skad ces 'phags ma khyed de skad ces @12b 'phags ma dag 'di na dge slong ma kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12b-4: 'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba kho na la dge slong ma kha cig ni skrod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12b-5: kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes ma zer cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12b-7: dge slong ma de dag ni 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12b-8: zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12b-9: gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12b-11: 'di ltar 'phags ma dag nyid khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa dag yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12b-12: khyed kyis khyim dag sun phyung ba yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12b-13: khyed sdig pa kun tu spyod par yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes pa'i phyir te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12b-14: 'phags ma dag 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12b-17: 'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam 'di lta bu 'di thong zhig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12b-18: dge slong ma de dag la dge slong ma rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12b-19: gal te gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12b-20: gal te mi gtong na gzhi de gtong bar bya ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12b-21: yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12b-22: lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12b-23: yang dag par bstan pa na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12b-24: gal te mi gtong na chos 'di yang lan gsum gyi bar gyis ltung bar 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:12b-25: 'byung ba dang bcas pa ste dge 'dun lhag ma'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13a-1: ma 'ga' zhig bka' blo mi bde ba'i rang bzhin can du gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13a-2: de la dge slong ma rnams kyis gdon par gtogs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams dang bde bar gshegs pa'i mdor gtogs pa rnams kyis chos dang mthun pa dang 'dul ba dang mthun par smra ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13a-3: 'phags ma dag khyed cag dge yang rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13a-5: bdag la ci yang ma smra zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13a-8: 'phags ma dag la ci yang mi smra'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13a-9: 'phags ma dag gis bdag la tshig gi lam thong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13a-10: khyed la yang bdag gis smras pas ci zhig bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13a-11: zhes bdag nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13a-12: dge slong ma de la dge slong ma rnams kyis 'di skad ces 'phags ma khyod dge slong ma rnams kyis gdon par gtogs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams dang; bde bar gshegs pa'i mdor gtogs pa rnams kyis chos dang mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13a-13: 'dul ba dang mthun par smra pa na bdag nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin par ma byed par 'phags mas bdag nyid brjod par bya ba kho nar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13a-14: dge slong ma rnams kyis 'phags ma la chos dang mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13a-15: 'dul ba dang mthun par smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13a-16: 'phags ma yang dge slong ma rnams la chos dang mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13a-17: 'dul ba dang mthun par smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13a-19: gcig la gcig brjod par bya ba nyid du byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13b-0: gcig la gcig 'doms shing rjes @13b su ston pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13b-1: gcig la gcig ltung ba las slong ba nyid de lta bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i 'khor 'di 'phel bar 'gyur gyi 'phags ma khyod bdag nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin par byed pa'i las kyi mtha' 'di lta bu 'di thong zhig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13b-2: dge slong ma de la dge slong ma rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13b-3: gal te gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13b-4: gal te mi gtong na gzhi de gtong bar bya ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13b-5: yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13b-6: lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13b-7: yang dag par bstan pa na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13b-8: gal te mi gtong na chos 'di yang lan gsum gyi bar gyis ltung bar 'gyur la 'byung ba dang bcas pa ste dge 'dun lhag ma'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13b-9: 'phags ma dag bdag gis dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos nyi shu po dag bton zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13b-10: de dag las bcu gnyis ni ltung ba dang po nyid kyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13b-11: brgyad ni lan gsum gyi bar gyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13b-12: dge slong mas de dag las ltung ba gang yang rung ba zhig byas la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13b-13: ji srid du shes bzhin du 'chab par byed pa de srid du de mi 'dod bzhin du spo ba bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13b-14: dge slong mas mi 'dod bzhin du spo ba byas nas de'i 'og tu zla ba phyed kyi bar du gnyi ga'i dge 'dun mgu bar bya ba spyad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:13b-15: dge slong mas mgu bar bya ba spyad nas dbyung ba la thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14a-0: chos dang mthun par byas la gnyi ga'i @14a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14a-1: sems mgu bar byas nas gang na gnyi ga'i dge 'dun bzhi bcu'i tshogs yod pa der dge slong ma dbyung bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14a-2: gnyi ga'i dge 'dun bzhi bcur gcig gis ma tshang ba'i tshogs kyis dge slong ma de 'byin par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14a-3: dge slong ma de yang ma phyin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14a-4: gnyi ga'i dge 'dun de dag kyang smad par bya ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14a-5: de la de ni cho ga yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14a-6: de la bdag gis 'phags ma dag la ci 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes dri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14a-7: ci 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14a-8: 'di la 'phags ma dag yongs su dag na 'di ltar cang mi smra bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14a-11: 'khru ba dang ni len pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14a-12: slong dang stod g-yogs smad g-yogs bcas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14a-13: rin thang so sor skur ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14a-14: 'phags ma dag spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu rtsa gsum po 'di dag ni zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa las 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14a-15: dge slong ma chos gos zin pas sra brkyang byung nas zhag bcu'i bar du gos lhag pa rung ba ma byas pa bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14a-16: de las lhag par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14a-17: dge slong ma chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung nas gal te nub gcig kyang chos gos lnga las gang yang rung ba dang mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14a-18: dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14b-0: @14b dge slong mas chos gos zin pa sra brkyang phyung nas dus ma yin pa'i gos shig rnyed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14b-1: 'dod na dge slong ma des gos blang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14b-2: blangs nas gal te langs na myur ba kho nar gos su byas te bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14b-3: gal te mi langs na kha ma langs pa kha skong ba'i gos la re ba yod na dge slong ma des gos de zla ba gcig gi mthar gzhag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14b-4: de las 'das par 'jog na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14b-5: yang dge slong ma gang dge slong nye du ma yin pa'i gos rnying pa 'khru'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14b-7: 'chags na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14b-8: yang dge slong ma gang dge slong nye du ma yin pa las gos len na brje ba ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14b-9: yang dge slong ma gang khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14b-10: gos slong na dus ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14b-11: de la dus ni 'di yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14b-12: dge slong ma gos phrogs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14b-16: gos chus khyer na de ni dus yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14b-17: dge slong ma gos phrogs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14b-22: khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song la blang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14b-23: gal te de la bram ze'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14b-24: khyim bdag dad pa can zhig gos mang po stobs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:14b-25: 'dod na dge slong ma des de las gos stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs dang bcas pa'i mthar thug pa blang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15a-1: len na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15a-2: dge slong ma'i phyir khyim bdag gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15a-3: khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pas gos kyi rin 'di dag spags nas bdag gis gos kyi rin 'di dag gis gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15a-4: dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15a-5: de la gos rung ba dus su bskon no snyam pa las de nas gal te dge slong ma de las sngar ma bstabs par rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15a-6: bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song nas 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15a-7: tshe dang ldan pas bdag gi phyir gos kyi rin dag spags pa'i gos kyi rin de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15a-8: bdag la gos rung ba dus su skon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15a-9: ces smras te gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15a-10: dge slong ma'i phyir khyim bdag gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15a-11: khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pas gos kyi rin so so dag spags nas bdag cag gnyis kyis gos kyi rin so so ba 'di dag gis gos 'di dang 'di lta bu so so ba 'di dag nyos la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15a-12: dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15a-13: bdag cag gnyis kyis so so nas de la gos rung ba dus su bskon no snyam pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15a-14: de la gal te dge slong ma de la sngar ma bstabs par rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhing byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15b-0: bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin @15b pa'i gan du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15b-1: 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis bdag gi phyir gos kyi rin so so ba gang dag spags pa'i gos kyi rin so so ba 'di dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag gos 'di dang 'di lta bu so so ba dag nyos la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15b-2: gnyi ga 'dus te bdag la gos rung ba zhig dus su legs par skon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15b-3: ces smras te gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15b-4: dge slong ma'i phyir rgyal po'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15b-12: ded dpon gyis pho nya'i lag tu gos kyi rin dag bskur bar gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15b-13: de nas pho nya des gos kyi rin de dag khyer nas dge slong ma ga la ba der song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15b-14: dge slong ma de la 'di skad ces 'phags ma mkhyen par mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15b-23: ded dpon che ge mos gos kyi rin 'di dag bskur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15b-24: 'phags ma thugs brtse ba'i slad du de dag bzhes shig ces zer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15b-25: dge slong ma des pho nya de la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa pho nya dge slong ma dag ni gos kyi rin dag len du mi rung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15b-26: bdag cag gos rung ba dus su rnyed na len to zhes brjod bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:15b-27: gal te pho nya de dge slong ma de la 'di skad ces 'phags ma rnams kyi zhal ta bgyid pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:16a-0: 'phags ma rnams kyi zhal ta nyams su len pa gang lags pa 'ga' mchis sam zhes @16a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:16a-2: dge slong ma gos 'dod pas pho nya 'di ni dge slong ma rnams kyi zhal ta byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:16a-3: 'di ni dge slong ma rnams kyi zhal ta nyams su len pa'o zhes kun dga' ra ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:16a-4: dge bsnyen zhal ta byed pa bstan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:16a-5: de nas pho nya des gos kyi rin dag khyer nas zhal ta byed pa ga la ba der 'gro bar bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:16a-6: phyin nas zhal ta byed pa de la 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:16a-7: tshe dang ldan pa zhal ta byed pa shes par gyis shig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33a-25: ci 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33a-26: 'di la 'phags ma dag yongs su dag na 'di ltar cang mi smra bas de bzhin du 'dzin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33a-28: mngon sum dran par ma myos dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33a-29: de bzhin gang mang ngo bo nyid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33a-30: rtsva rnams bkram pa lta bu dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33a-31: khas blang bar yang bya ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33a-33: rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun po 'di dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33b-0: zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar @33b pa'i mdo gdon pa las 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33b-1: mngon sum gyis 'dul bar 'os pa la mngon sum gyis 'dul ba sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33b-2: dran pas 'dul bar 'os pa la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33b-3: ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa la ma myos pas 'dul ba sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33b-4: gang tshul shing mang po sbyin par 'os pa la tshul shing mang po sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33b-5: de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33b-6: rtsva bkram pa lta bur 'os pa la rtsva bkram pa lta bu sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33b-7: gang khas blang bar 'os pa la khas blang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33b-8: rtsod pa byung bar gyur pa rnams rtsod pa zhi ba'i chos bdun po 'di dag gis chos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33b-10: ston pa'i bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du dul bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33b-14: bdag gis rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun po dag bton zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33b-15: de la bdag gis 'phags ma dag la ci 'di la khyod yongs su dag gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33b-17: ci 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33b-18: 'di la 'phags ma dag yongs su dag na 'di ltar cang mi smra bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33b-19: 'phags ma dag bdag gis so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa'i gleng gzhi bton zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33b-20: pham par 'gyur ba'i chos brgyad dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33b-21: dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos nyi shu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33b-22: spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu rtsa gsum dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33b-23: ltung byed kyi chos brgya brgyad cu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:33b-24: so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos bcu gcig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-2: rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun po dag bton zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i mdor gtogs shing bsdus pa ni 'di dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-4: gang gzhan nas 'byung ba'i chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos de la yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-8: mi rtsod par sems kun tu bsrung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-9: dran pa dang bag yod pas rnal 'byor du bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-10: bzod pa dka' thub dam pa bzod pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-11: mya ngan 'das pa mchog ces sangs rgyas gsung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-12: rab tu byung ba gzhan la gnod pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-13: gzhan la 'tshe ba dge sbyong ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-14: mig ldan 'gro ba yod pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-15: nyam nga ba dag ji bzhin du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-17: sdig pa dag ni yongs su spong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-18: skur pa mi gdab gnod mi bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-19: so sor thar pa'ang bsdam par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-20: zas kyi tshod kyang rig par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-21: bas mtha'i gnas su gnas par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-22: lhag pa'i sems la yang dag sbyor //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-23: 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-24: ji ltar bung ba me tog las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-25: kha dog dri la mi gnod par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-26: khu ba bzhi bas nas 'phur ba ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-27: de bzhin du thub pa grong du rgyu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-28: bdag gis rigs dang mi rigs la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-29: brtag par bya ste gzhan rnams kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-30: mi mthun pa dang gzhan rnams kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34a-31: byas dang ma byas rnams la min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-0: lhag pa'i sems la @34b bag bya ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-1: thub pa'i bslab gzhi rnams la bslab //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-2: nyer zhi rtag tu dran ldan pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-3: skyob pa mya ngan med pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-4: sbyin pas bsod nams rab tu 'phel //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-5: legs bsdams dgra sogs mi 'gyur ro; ;dge dang ldan pas sdig pa spong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-6: nyon mongs zad pas mya ngan 'da'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-7: sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-8: dge ba phun sum tshogs par spyad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-9: rang gi sems ni yongs su gdul //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-10: 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-11: lus kyi sdom pa legs pa ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-12: ngag gi sdom pa legs pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-13: yid kyi sdom pa'ang legs pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-14: thams cad du ni sdom pa legs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-15: kun tu bsdam pa'i dge slong ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-16: sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-17: ngag rnams bsrungs shing yid kyis rab bsdams te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-18: lus kyis mi dge ba dag mi byed cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-19: las lam gsum po 'di dag rab sbyangs na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-20: drang srong gsungs pa'i lam ni thob par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-21: sangs rgyas rnam gzigs gtsug tor thams cad skyob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-22: 'khor ba 'jig dang gser thub 'od srung dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-23: sh'akya thub pa go'u ta ma lha yi lha //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-24: mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba bla na med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-25: 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-26: sangs rgyas dpa' bo bdun po dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-27: grags ldan rnams kyi so so thar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-28: 'di na rab tu rgyas par bton //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-29: 'di la sangs rgyas rnams dang gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-30: sangs rgyas nyan thos rnams kyang gus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-31: 'di la gus dang bcas gyur pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-32: 'dus ma byas pa thob par gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:34b-33: brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:35a-2: 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:35a-3: 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:35a-4: gang zhig rab tu bag yod par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:35a-5: chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba; ;skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:35a-6: sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:35a-7: phan tshun tshul khrims bsrung ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:35a-8: bstan pa 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:35a-9: so sor thar pa 'di bton pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:35a-10: dge 'dun gyis ni gso sbyong byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:35a-11: gang gi phyir ni mdo bton dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:35a-12: gang phyir gso sbyong byas gyur pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:35a-13: tshul khrims de ni bsrung bya ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:35a-14: g-yag rnga'i rtse mo ji bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:35a-15: so sor thar pa bton pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:35a-16: bsod nams grub pa gang yod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:35a-17: des ni 'jig rten ma lus pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:35a-18: thub dbang go 'phang thob par shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:35a-19: dge slong ma'i so sor thar pa'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:35a-20: dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag dpal lha btsan po'i bka' lung gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:35a-21: 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa kha che bye brag tu smra ba'i slob dpon dzi na mi tra dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-009-001:35a-22: zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
